data.title: Girish Karnad death: Venkatesh Daggubati pens a heartfelt note about his Dharma Chakram co
data.meta_description: Girish Karnad death: Venkatesh Daggubati pens a heartfelt note about his Dharma Chakram co-star - Girish Karnad has acted in many films in multiple languages including Bollywood and has shared screen space with star actors like Salman Khan, Venkatesh and many others.
data.text:
India woke up today to a tragic news of the passing away of renowned playwright, actor and theater personality Girish Karnad. The veteran breathed his last at his residence in Bengaluru after being unwell for a few days now. Fans, colleagues and celebrities across the nation mourned the demise of Girish Karnad including Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Girish Karnad has acted in many films in multiple languages including Bollywood and has shared screen space with star actors like Salman Khan, Venkatesh and many others. Girish Karnad's co-star in Telugu film Dharma Chakram Venkatesh Daggubati penned an emotional note and shared a throwback picture with the veteran remembering him. "It was a wonderful experience to share screen with you, to have worked with you. My deepest condolences to the family members. May your soul rest in peace sir! #GirishKarnad[sic]," wrote Venkatesh I'm his post on Instagram. Check it out right here:

Karnad has been unwell for a while now and was being treated for a while. After a prolonged illness, the veteran breathed his late today in the wee hours. Many celebrities from Indian film and theater fraternity mourned the passing away of the prominent playwright who was held in high regards across the nation. From Puneeth Rajkumar to Kamal Haasan to Anupam Kher, celebrities from various film industries took to social media and posted condolence messages. Check out few tweets here:

Girish Karnad is a recipient of Jnanapith Award and was also conferred with Padma Bhushan in 1992. The veteran was also a Rhodes Scholar which helped him earn a Master of Arts degree in Philosophy, Economics and Political science.

Stay tuned to BollywoodLife for all latest updates from the world of entertainment!
